results.name: Smallest nonnegative integer k such that (k+1)*2^n-1 is prime.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: A127587 := proc(n) local k; k:=0 ; while true do if isprime( (k+1)*2^n-1) then RETURN(k) ; fi ; k := k+1 ; od ; end: for n from 0 to 100 do printf("%d, ",A127587(n)) ; od ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 22 2007
mathematica: a = {}; Do[k = 0; While[ ! PrimeQ[k 2^n + 2^n - 1], k++ ]; AppendTo[a, k], {n, 0, 50}]; a
